common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Use this api to get detail information of a return by return sn.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no sign in query.

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: Query offer info failed. Please try later.

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: Query order info failed. Please try later.

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: Query proof info failed. Please try later.

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: Query return info failed. Please try later.

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: Get user info failed. Please try later.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Return SN or ID is invalid.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: The return you queried doesn't exist.

error_list.name: error_permission
error_list.description: Please link shop and partner on seller center.

True means main item, false means sub item.","key":"dmNSfJ"},{"sample":"0","type":"int64","name":"add_on_deal_id","description":"The unique identity of an addon deal.","key":"KpQxXZZ"},{"sample":"2700126223","type":"int64","name":"item_id","description":"The id of item.","key":"KCzJJHs"},{"sample":"USB","type":"string","name":"item_sku","description":"The sku of item.","key":"tiSShsK"},{"sample":"RED","type":"string","name":"variation_sku","description":"the variation sku of item","key":"CSyaSyj"},{"description":"

item's refund amount for bundle deal cases, only for shops whitelisted for Partial Qty RR.

","name":"refund_amount","sample":"12.34","type":"float","required":null,"key":"PSsssTH"}],"key":"SKYtMWa"},{"sample":"","description":"","type":"object","children":[{"sample":"PENDING","type":"string","name":"seller_proof_status","description":"

To indicate whether the seller needs to provide evidence when the return status is RETURN_JUDING, RETURN_SELLER_DISPUTE and RETURN_ACCEPTED. Applicable values: See Data Definition- SellerProofStatus.

","key":"KHEiHKt"},{"sample":"1655438336","type":"timestamp","name":"seller_evidence_deadline","description":"

To indicate the deadline for submitting the evidence.

","key":"wCApBfd"}],"name":"seller_proof","key":"TYxdDki"},{"sample":"","description":"","type":"object","children":[{"sample":"PENDING_REQUEST","type":"string","name":"seller_compensation_status","description":"To indicate whether the seller is eligible for raising a compensation request. See \"Data Definition - SellerCompensationStatus\"","key":"BdXtCky"},{"sample":"1655438336","type":"timestamp","name":"seller_compensation_due_date","description":"To indicate the deadline for requesting the compensation","key":"mEHsfzN"},{"sample":"100.0","type":"float","name":"compensation_amount","description":"To indicate the compensation amount that the agent decided","key":"QXtssGQ"}],"name":"seller_compensation","key":"PkzaeEz"},{"sample":"","description":"","type":"object","children":[{"sample":"PENDING_RESPOND","type":"string","name":"negotiation_status","description":"To indicate whether the seller can negotiate with the buyer. See \"Data Definition - NegotiationStatus\"","key":"DDMpzwT"},{"sample":"RETURN_REFUND","type":"string","name":"latest_solution","description":"To indicate what is the offer solution. See \"Data Definition - ReturnSolution\"","key":"QYDTamX"},{"sample":"12.34","type":"float","name":"latest_offer_amount","description":"To indicate the refund amount in the latest offer solution","key":"YsFxrNJ"},{"sample":"username","type":"string","name":"latest_offer_creator","description":"To indicate which party made the latest offer","key":"xkQfWHp"},{"sample":"0","type":"int32","name":"counter_limit","description":"To indicate the remaining counter limit","key":"rrdyTWm"},{"sample":"1655438336","type":"timestamp","name":"offer_due_date","description":"To indicate offer_due_date","key":"WCjfhC"}],"name":"negotiation","key":"dNxkQY"},{"sample":"LOGISTICS_REQUEST_CREATED","type":"string","name":"logistics_status","description":"

To indicate the reverse logistics status. See \"Data Definition - LogisticsStatus\".


Note: 

- This is a legacy field that only reflects the reverse logistics status of Normal RR. To determine whether the RR is a Normal RR, check if return_refund_request_type = 0.

- If you need the reverse logistics status for Normal RR, In-transit RR, or Return-on-the-Spot, please use the newly released field reverse_logistic_status instead.

","key":"JiTYFaH"},{"description":"

To indicate the latest reverse logistic status of a return, referring to the current status of the buyer shipping the return parcel back to the validation point (seller or warehouse), including Normal RR, In-transit RR, and Return-on-the-Spot.


See \"Data Definition - ReverseLogisticsStatus\" as status displayed for Normal RR and In-transit RR or Return-on-the-Spot are different.

","name":"reverse_logistic_status","sample":"LOGISTICS_REQUEST_CREATED","type":"string","required":null,"key":"EXPXSpb"},{"sample":"","description":"To indicate the buyer's pickup address","type":"object","children":[{"sample":"BLOCK 106, HENDERSON CRESCENT","type":"string","name":"address","description":"

To indicate receiver's address

","key":"ZZsGZtQ"},{"sample":"name","type":"string","name":"name","description":"

To indicate receiver's name

","key":"jXGfzfc"},{"sample":"6512345678","type":"string","name":"phone","description":"

To indicate receiver's phone
[Only for TW non-integrated channel] Will return \"****\" when the \"virtual_contact_number\" is available

","key":"izhGkSG"},{"sample":"Batino","type":"string","name":"town","description":"

To indicate receiver's town

","key":"Mbpdnxy"},{"sample":"Calamba City","type":"string","name":"district","description":"

To indicate receiver's district

","key":"aTYJFFE"},{"sample":"Laguna","type":"string","name":"city","description":"

To indicate receiver's city

","key":"hhwpspw"},{"sample":"South Luzon","type":"string","name":"state","description":"

To indicate receiver's state

","key":"zrRhWFp"},{"sample":"SG","type":"string","name":"region","description":"

To indicate receiver's region

","key":"YpMrdnZ"},{"sample":"150106","type":"string","name":"zipcode","description":"

To indicate receiver's zip code

","key":"fksCyDj"}],"name":"return_pickup_address","key":"YMcrcmX"},{"description":"

[Only for TW non-integrated channel] The virtual phone number to contact the recipient.

","name":"virtual_contact_number","sample":"0928000886","type":"string","required":null,"key":"sFKiCkE"},{"description":"

[Only for TW non-integrated channel] The query number used in virtual phone number calls to contact the recipient of this return.

","name":"package_query_number","sample":"66668888","type":"string","required":null,"key":"zaQaXCd"},{"description":"","name":"return_address","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"CHZmnar","children":[{"description":"

To indicate the warehouse id where item will be returned to. 

Please call v2.shop.get_warehouse_detail to check the detailed warehouse information the item returned to with the field \"location_id\" of the v2.shop.get_warehouse_detail match to the field\"whs_id\"of the v2.return.get_return_detail.


For fulfillment by Shopee (FBS) & multi warehouse sellers, R/R orders will be returned back to the nearest warehouse of buyer address instead of going back to only 1 default return address like a normal seller.If it's a normal seller, then the field will be response empty.

","name":"whs_id","sample":"SGC","type":"string","required":null,"key":"TykDGWE"}]},{"description":"

To indicate whether the return is RRBOC (Return/Refund request raised before Order Complete) or RRAOC (Return/Refund request raised after Order Complete).

","name":"return_refund_type","sample":"RRAOC","type":"string","required":null,"key":"thhkjJp"},{"description":"

To indicate the most updated solution of the Return/Refund request (NOTE: this is not the solution during negotiation). Applicable value: 

- 0: Return and Refund

- 1: Refund Only

","name":"return_solution","sample":"0","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"NnDGrfp"},{"description":"

To indicate whether the return_sn is using the “Seller Arrange” return method. This would only be True for TW and BR.

","name":"is_seller_arrange","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"mChrdeT"},{"description":"

To indicate whether uploading shipping proof is mandatory for seller to confirm \"Arrange Pickup\" when is_seller_arrange = true.

","name":"is_shipping_proof_mandatory","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"EzmSRja"},{"description":"

To indicate whether seller has already uploaded shipping proof for this return.

","name":"has_uploaded_shipping_proof","sample":"false","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"zQwzjBT"},{"description":"

To indicate whether the reverse logistic channel type selected is integrated or non-integrated.

","name":"is_reverse_logistics_channel_integrated","sample":"false","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"wCpRsBD"},{"description":"

To indicate reverse logistic carrier name.

","name":"reverse_logistic_channel_name","sample":"test_reverse_logistic_channel_name","type":"string","required":null,"key":"pxkfEXy"},{"description":"

To indicate the type of return refund request, whether it is a Normal RR request, an In-transit RR request, and a Return on the Spot: 

0: Normal RR (RR is raised by the buyer after delivery done / estimated delivery date)

1: In-transit RR (RR is raised by the buyer while item is still in-transit to buyer)

2: Return-on-the-Spot (RR is raised by the driver after buyer rejected parcel at delivery)


For more details, see Data Definition- Return Refund Request Type.

","name":"return_refund_request_type","sample":"0","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"zMmZRKS"},{"description":"

To indicate whether seller or warehouse will expect to receive the return parcel from buyer and validate the condition of the parcel: 

- seller_validation 

- warehouse_validation


For more details, see Data Definition- ValidationType.

","name":"validation_type","sample":"seller_validation","type":"string","required":null,"key":"YbzPiEy"},{"description":"

[Only for validation_type = warehouse_validation] Indicates the parcel’s check-in status at the warehouse. This field helps sellers quickly determine whether the parcel has arrived at the warehouse or has been rejected. 


Applicable values:

1: Pending Inbound

2: Rejected

3: Inbound

4: Cancelled

","name":"is_arrived_at_warehouse","sample":"3","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"zXnsjpS"},{"description":"

[Only for validation_type = warehouse_validation] Warehouse handling actions for each item in the parcel.

","name":"follow_up_action_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"bYSpbES","children":[{"description":"

Unique identifier of the item.

","name":"item_id","sample":"2700126223","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"ASKsQMT"},{"description":"

Unique identifier of the model under the item.

","name":"model_id","sample":"2000458802","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"kYTxxfk"},{"description":"

Quantity of items or models under the same current status.

","name":"qty","sample":"2","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"BQfiiYj"},{"description":"

Current status for the item/model within the warehouse.


Applicable values:

1：Dispose

2：Return to Seller

7：Received and Putaway

8：Return to Buyer

9：Shortage


Note: Since Resell is currently applicable only to Failed Delivery parcels, the following values will not be returned for now, and will be returned once Resell becomes applicable to Return Refund parcels in the future:

3：Putaway for Resell

4：Resell Outbound

5：Resell Failed

6：Resell Exit

","name":"current_status","sample":"2","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"PKMbKAD"},{"description":"

List of order_sn generated from the Resell process. Returned only when current_status = 4 (Resell Outbound).


Note: Since Resell is currently applicable only to Failed Delivery parcels, this field will remain empty for now, and valid values will be returned once Resell becomes applicable to Return Refund parcels in the future.

","name":"related_order_sn_list","sample":"[]","type":"string[]","required":null,"key":"AYsrBhj"},{"description":"

Next step after a Resell failure. Returned only when current_status = 5 (Resell Failed).


Note: Since Resell is currently applicable only to Failed Delivery parcels, this field will remain empty for now, and valid values will be returned once Resell becomes applicable to Return Refund parcels in the future.

","name":"resell_failed_next_step","sample":"\"\"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"CYEdBRP"}]}],"key":"daaxcaQ"}]}

update_log_list.content: Add is_arrived_at_warehouse and follow_up_action_list response fields
Add return_refund_request_type and validation_type response fields
Add is_seller_arrange, is_shipping_proof_mandatory, has_uploaded_shipping_proof, is_reverse_logistics_channel_integrated, reverse_logistic_channel_name response fields
Add new return_refund_type and return_solution response parameters, and add NOT_NEEDED option for seller_proof_status
